WelcomeMessage:
👋 *Welcome to Scratch Map Bot\!*

🗺️ It generates an image of map that has all the countries you've been to highlighted\!

📋 To have your scratch map generated, list the countries you've visited like so:

*"France, Italy, Germany \.\.\."*

😞 Only countries of *Europe* are supported as of right now, unfortunately

🔎 Use */info* to learn more about this bot
InvalidInputMessage:
🚫 Please provide a list of countries in the following format:

*"Germany, France, Italy \.\.\."*

Make sure the country names are separated by *exactly one comma and a space*
UnrecognizedInputsListHeader: 🚫 These inputs are not valid country names or are not yet supported:
InfoMessage:
This bot was developed as a programming practice project\.

Source code: *[GitHub](https://github\.com/ikudryashov/scratch\_map\_bot)*
Map tiles provided by *MapTiler* for non\-commercial personal projects
ScratchmapGenerationErrorMessage: An error occured when generating your scratch map\. Please try again later\.
